function(n){return e.complete(n,i,o,u,c,r)}}(this),e+=-1===e.indexOf("?")?"?callback="+s:"&callback="+s,l=a(s),l.src=e,void f.appendChild(l))},e.prototype.get=function(e,n){return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                    small-24
                    medium-24
                    large-24 large-offset-0
                    xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb_topo"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="areatemplate-topo row-full-width"></div><div class="row"><div class="small-24 column areatemplate-showtime"></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio

                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row small-collapse medium-uncollapse"><div class="areatemplate-direita-superior

                    medium-20 medium-offset-2 medium-pull-2

                    xlarge-7 xlarge-offset-1 xlarge-pull-1
                    float-right"></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda

                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-15 large-offset-0

class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Itapetininga e Região</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 14 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sao-paulo/itapetininga-regiao/noticia/guarda-municipal-captura-jiboia-em-bairro-de-guarei.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Guarda Municipal captura jiboia em bairro de Guareí</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Moradores encontraram a cobra no bairro CDHU. Jiboia foi capturada e devolvida ao meio ambiente.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/natureza/noticia/atualizado-pela-1a-vez-em-30-anos-atlas-traz-12-novos-tipos-de-nuvens.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/tk9W-a4lAdf2_YMndlf06VuVAwA=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/zB-EU0GJ0iFkzS_jfEpS9khZd5w=/810x456/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/Re_coF9AOZC_kG1hZdOq1r_ncDo=/1080x608/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/tk9W-a4lAdf2_YMndlf06VuVAwA=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Natureza</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/natureza/noticia/atualizado-pela-1a-vez-em-30-anos-atlas-traz-12-novos-tipos-de-nuvens.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Atualizado pela 1ª vez em 30 anos, atlas traz 12 &#039;novos&#039; tipos de nuvens</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Elaborada originalmente no século 19, publicação é referência global para identificação de nuvens na meteorologia, navegação e avião.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sp/campinas-regiao/plano-de-voo/noticia/supercamera-registra-imagens-exclusivas-do-mundo-pelo-olhar-de-ave-durante-voo-veja-videos.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover bstn-fd-video-cover" style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" alt="Supercâmera registra imagens exclusivas do mundo pelo olhar de ave durante voo; veja vídeos</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">A ave Maya tem 4 anos e está acostumada a sobrevoar o céu de SC com câmera de 40g. Reportagem faz parte da série Plano de Voo, da EPTV.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Ciência e Saúde</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ciencia-e-saude/noticia/a-cratera-sob-o-golfo-do-mexico-que-pode-esconder-as-chaves-sobre-a-origem-da-vida-na-terra.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">A cratera sob o Golfo do México que pode esconder as chaves sobre a origem da vida na Terra</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Cientistas afirmam que as rochas contêm indícios de que abrigaram grande &#039;sistema hidrotermal&#039;.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body-resumo">Plantas do bioma atuam como imensa esponja, recarregando aquíferos que abastecem rios e reservatórios de vários pontos do país, diz professor.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Natureza</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Cães foram levados par abrigos, onde serão examinados. Carne de cerca de 2 milhões de cachorros é consumida a cada ano na Coreia do Sul.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div
